magpie.data.utilities.modifiers

Class BaseDatasetModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.modifiers.BaseDatasetModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddPropertyModifier, ClassEliminationModifier, ClassIntervalModifier, CompositionSetDistanceModifier, DiscreteToContinuousModifier, ErrorSignalModifier, HHICalculationModifier, NaNToMeanModifier, NonZeroClassModifier, PartitionToClassModifier, SetClassNamesModifier, StabilityCalculationModifier, VolumeToLatticeParamModifier

    public abstract class BaseDatasetModifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options
    Perform some kind of manipulation on a Dataset, and all of the entries.

    Implementations of this class must provide:

    • modifyDataset(magpie.data.Dataset) - Make changes to the dataset as whole and each entry
    • Object.clone() - Ensure clones of this class do not share references
    • Options.setOptions(java.util.List<java.lang.Object>) and Options.printUsage() - Handle user options

    Note, you may want to make special considerations for MultiPropertyDatasets if you are adjusting the class variables. See example in NonZeroClassModifier.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
